Interface BaseService<Dto,​ID extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    Dto - Dto class
    ID - Id class
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccountHistoryService, AccountService, CreditService, DepositService, ExchangeRateService, PersonService, TransactionService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountHistoryServiceImpl, AccountServiceImpl, CreditServiceImpl, DepositServiceImpl, ExchangeRateServiceImpl, PersonServiceImpl, TransactionServiceImpl
    public interface BaseService<Dto,​ID extends java.io.Serializable>
    The interface from which all services interfaces must be inherited.

    0.1
    Author:
    unvise
